name: Bouncing Shibastronaut
description:
Bouncing Shibastronaut

Help a cute shiba reach the moon by drawing trampolines !

How to play:

  • Draw trampolines by swiping in the dotted area of the screen
  • You have a limited amount of trampolines so place them carefully
  • Smaller trampolines send you higher !

Bugs you might encounter:

  • Sometimes the trampolines don't work after restarting. I have no idea why or how that happens
  • There is no pause screen, so you have to die to get back to the menu (don't worry, the game keeps your progress)

This game was inspired by the mario DS minigame "Trampoline Time" and the style of flash games.
